a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Mean income or consumption per day vs. Daily GDP per capita, 2021
This data is adjusted for inflation and for differences in the cost of living between countries.
Mean income or expenditure per day
Data source: World Bank Poverty and Inequality Platform (2022); Data compiled from multiple sources by World Bank
Note: This data is expressed in international-$ at 2017 prices. Depending on the country and year, the mean relates to income
measured after taxes and benefits, or to consumption, per capita.
